AT.name: Sonic Lost World™
AT.description: In seinem neuesten Versuch, Sonic zu besiegen und die Weltherrschaft an sich zu reißen, hat Dr. Eggman die Kräfte der sechs schauerlichen Kreaturen an sich gerissen, die als die Schrecklichen Sechs bekannt sind. Als sich die Schrecklichen Sechs jedoch gegen ihren Meister erheben, muss sich Sonic mit seinem Erzfeind Dr. Eggman verbünden und den mystischen Hexaglobus finden, um es mit ihnen Kopf an Kopf aufnehmen zu können. Setze Sonics fantastische neue Fertigkeiten und seine unglaubliche Farbenergie ein, um durch eine Vielzahl einzigartiger Gebiete zu rasen, ob nun innen, außen oder kopfüber.

AU.name: Sonic Lost World™
AU.description: In his latest plot to defeat Sonic and rule the world, Dr. Eggman has harnessed the power of six menacing creatures known as the Deadly Six. However, when the Deadly Six rise up against their new master, Sonic must unite with his arch nemesis Eggman and explore the mystical Lost Hex in order to take them on head-to-head. Use Sonic’s new moves & Colour Powers to speed across a variety of unique terrains, racing inside, outside and upside down in every level.

BG.name: Sonic Lost World™
BG.description: In his latest plot to defeat Sonic and rule the world, Dr. Eggman has harnessed the power of six menacing creatures known as the Deadly Six. However, when the Deadly Six rise up against their new master, Sonic must unite with his arch nemesis Eggman and explore the mystical Lost Hex in order to take them on head-to-head. Use Sonic’s new moves & Colour Powers to speed across a variety of unique terrains, racing inside, outside and upside down in every level.

BE.name: Sonic Lost World™
BE.description: Dans sa dernière tentative de vaincre Sonic et de conquérir le monde, Dr Eggman a exploité le pouvoir de six créatures menaçantes connues sous le nom des Effroyables Six. Cependant, alors que les Effroyables Six se rebellent contre leur nouveau maître, Sonic doit s'unir à son ennemi juré, Eggman, et explorer le mystérieux Hexamonde perdu afin de les affronter en face-à-face. Utilise les nouveaux coups extraordinaires de Sonic et ses incroyables pouvoirs des couleurs pour traverser à toute allure de nombreux décors uniques en courant dans tous les sens à travers chaque niveau.

ES.name: Sonic Lost World™
ES.description: En su último intento por derrotar a Sonic y dominar el mundo, el Dr. Eggman cuenta con el poder de seis criaturas aterradoras: Los Mortíferos Seis. Sin embargo, cuando estos se rebelan contra su nuevo amo, a Sonic no le queda otra que aliarse con su archienemigo, el Dr. Eggman, y explorar Héxagon para poder vencerlos. Utiliza los nuevos y alucinantes movimientos de Sonic y sus increíbles poderes de color para explorar diferentes y únicos territorios, ¡corriendo dentro, fuera e incluso del revés en cada nivel!

IT.name: Sonic Lost World™
IT.description: Nel suo ultimo tentativo di sconfiggere Sonic e conquistare il mondo, il Dr. Eggman ha assoggettato sei terribili creature conosciute come i Sei Nefasti. Quando questi si ribellano al loro nuovo padrone, però, Sonic deve allearsi con il suo arcinemico, Eggman, ed esplorare il misterioso Esamondo Perduto per affrontarli faccia a faccia. Usa le nuove fantastiche mosse di Sonic e gli incredibili poteri dei colori per sfrecciare in tanti ambienti unici, correndo dentro, fuori, sopra e sotto in ogni livello!

NO.name: Sonic Lost World™
NO.description: In his latest plot to defeat Sonic and rule the world, Dr. Eggman has harnessed the power of six menacing creatures known as the Deadly Six. However, when the Deadly Six rise up against their new master, Sonic must unite with his arch nemesis Eggman and explore the mystical Lost Hex in order to take them on head-to-head. Use Sonic’s new moves & Colour Powers to speed across a variety of unique terrains, racing inside, outside and upside down in every level.

NL.name: Sonic Lost World™
NL.description: Voor zijn laatste plan om Sonic te verslaan en over de wereld te heersen gebruikt Dr. Eggman de kracht van zes gevaarlijke wezens, die de Deadly Six worden genoemd. Als de Deadly Six echter in opstand komen tegen hun nieuwe meester, moet Sonic met zijn aartsvijand Eggman gaan samenwerken en de mysterieuze Lost Hex verkennen om de directe confrontatie aan te gaan. Ren over diverse soorten uniek terrein met Sonics ongelooflijke nieuwe moves & ongelooflijke Colour Powers, en race in elk level binnenstebuiten, buitenstebinnen en ondersteboven.

NZ.name: Sonic Lost World™
NZ.description: In his latest plot to defeat Sonic and rule the world, Dr. Eggman has harnessed the power of six menacing creatures known as the Deadly Six. However, when the Deadly Six rise up against their new master, Sonic must unite with his arch nemesis Eggman and explore the mystical Lost Hex in order to take them on head-to-head. Use Sonic’s new moves & Colour Powers to speed across a variety of unique terrains, racing inside, outside and upside down in every level.

PL.name: Sonic Lost World™
PL.description: In his latest plot to defeat Sonic and rule the world, Dr. Eggman has harnessed the power of six menacing creatures known as the Deadly Six. However, when the Deadly Six rise up against their new master, Sonic must unite with his arch nemesis Eggman and explore the mystical Lost Hex in order to take them on head-to-head. Use Sonic’s new moves & Colour Powers to speed across a variety of unique terrains, racing inside, outside and upside down in every level.

PT.name: Sonic Lost World™
PT.description: Na sua mais recente conspiração para derrotar o Sonic e governar o mundo, o Dr. Eggman reuniu o poder de seis ameaçadoras criaturas conhecidas como os Seis Mortíferos. Porém, quando os Seis Mortíferos se rebelam contra o seu novo amo, o Sonic deverá unir-se ao seu arqui-inimigo Eggman e explorar o místico Lost Hex para os poder enfrentar "mano a mano". Usa os fantásticos novos golpes do Sonic e os seus incríveis Poderes Coloridos para correr a alta velocidade numa variedade de terrenos, correndo dentro, fora e de cabeça para baixo em todos os níveis.

RU.name: Sonic Lost World™
RU.description: Желая во что бы то ни стало победить ежа Sonic и захватить власть над миром, Dr. Eggman призвал на помощь шестерых существ из иного измерения, известных как Deadly Six. Но чудовища перехитрили нового хозяина: накопив достаточно энергии, они восстали против него, и теперь Eggman вынужден объединиться с Sonic, чтобы спасти родную планету от катастрофы. Заклятым врагам предстоит бок о бок обойти загадочный мир Lost Hex и истребить пришельцев одного за другим. Используйте новые приемы Sonic и энергию цветов, исследуйте удивительную планету изнутри, снаружи и вверх тормашками!

SE.description: In his latest plot to defeat Sonic and rule the world, Dr. Eggman has harnessed the power of six menacing creatures known as the Deadly Six.
